name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition Contents Kit
summary:
The Ultimate Edition Content Kit includes the Digital Soundtrack, Digital Artwork and Guilty Gear: Strive - Ultimate Edition Special Colors. All included content is exclusive to this package.
The physical Ultimate Edition release came with a single-use code for this content.

The Ultimate Edition Special Colors include the 5 characters in Season Pass 1 along with the 15 in the initial roster. The 4 characters added in Season Pass 2 get this color variation as part of Additional Color Pack 2.

The soundtrack includes a total of 55 songs, featuring more than 15 vocal themes and 40 background tracks used in the Story Mode.

The Artwork includes various art and visuals from the Guilty Gear series’ history including the main visuals of each game and a number of unreleased illustrations from renowned guest artists.
